title: The Massingham Trailers
brief_description: Six of the trailers made by Richard Massingham to be attached to newsreels. 1) The Five-Inch Bather, 1942. 2) Coughs and Sneezes, 1945. 3) Read Any Good Meters Lately?, 1947. 4) Pedestrian Crossings, 1948. 5) Jet Propelled Germs, 1948?, 6) A Knotty problem, 1951.
